DOC.brief_summary: To investigate pathomorphological functional variation choroidal neovascularization ( CNV ) age-related macular degeneration ( AMD ) Chinese population use optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) find kind Fundus characteristic indicate exudative AMD .
DOC.brief_title: A Population-based Study Macular Choroidal Neovascularization Chinese Population
DOC.detailed_description: This population-based study enrol 59 patient ( > 45 year old ; 70 eye ) early intermediate-stage AMD Youyi Street , Baoshan District , Shanghai , China . Comprehensive standardize ophthalmic examination include visual acuity , anterior segment analysis slit lamp , dilate fundus evaluation direct ophthalmoscopy , 90D handheld lens , fundus photography , fluorescein angiography ( FFA ) , fast optic disk scan use OCT . The macular CNV characteristic profile early intermediate-stage AMD determine OCT. Data obtain first visit 6 24 month follow-up , FFA OCT outcomes early intermediate-stage AMD patient analyze .
DOC.criteria: adult citizen age 45 year lose sample
